GHGP and include:
i. indirect Scope 3 GHG emissions from the consolidated accounting group (the
parent and its subsidiaries),
ii. indirect Scope 3 GHG emissions from associates, joint ventures, and
unconsolidated subsidiaries for which the undertaking has the ability to control the
operational activities and relationships (i.e., operational control),
iii. Scope 1, 2 and 3 GHG emissions from associates, joint ventures, unconsolidated
